name: Canopy (was Encarte)
headline: Encarte is building 1-click checkout for all online stores.

Thousands of investors and managers, from multi-billion dollar hedge funds to fresh syndicate leads, use Canopy‚Äôs software to set up funds, manage capital, and report performances online.

Why Canopy?
## A technology-first approach to funding
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61c383d3f268d708dee7e263_bullit-1.svg)
Full Transparency
Dashboards keep track of exactly where investors are in the closing process, and automatic communications keep them informed.
‚ÄúI love running my deals through Canopy! Beyond closing the opportunity, Canopy makes it easy for me to update my LPs through email updates and platform announcements.‚Äù
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61cd965f80bba0febe0058e1_Liu-Jiang-LinkedIn.jpg)
Liu Jiang
Manager at Sunflower Capital
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61c383d39e2602cb79dddf41_bullit-3.svg)
Pay When Your Fund Closes
Payment is fully automated and happens after your opportunity has been funded. There is no upfront cost to using Canopy.
‚ÄúMy friend is leading a syndicate on another platform. I noticed the large upfront platform fees relative to Canopy, so I suggested that she make the switch. The easier to use interface and better economics makes it a better option.‚Äù
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61cdf911a6eb896c904bf894_Deb-Liu-LinkedIn.jpg)
Deb Liu
Seed Investor
**Sleek User Experience**
Platform designs are optimized for an intuitive user experience. LPs can sign subscription documents with one-click and link bank accounts to fund investments instantly.
‚ÄúReally like the UI of Canopy. Way better than other co-investment platforms for sure.‚Äù
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61c386a6753d19b4f26dad22_autor-4.png)
David Dang
VP at Zendesk
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61c4aeea9ce77e0745d5181a_triangle-2.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61c4aeeacae2b78334b9e8da_triangle-1.svg)
Get Started Immediately
Canopy uses software to generate all documents. Get started in minutes, not weeks!
‚ÄúVery pleased with responsiveness, care, and product experience. They are FAST.‚Äù
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61c386a69e260224caddeab9_autor-2.png)
Holly Liu
Co-Founder at Kabam
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61c383d3f268d708dee7e263_bullit-1.svg)
Full Transparency
Dashboards keep track of exactly where investors are in the closing process, and automatic communications keep them informed too.
‚ÄúI love running my deals through Canopy! Beyond closing the opportunity, Canopy makes it easy for me to update my LPs through email updates and platform announcements.‚Äù
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61cd965f80bba0febe0058e1_Liu-Jiang-LinkedIn.jpg)
Liu Jiang
Manager at Sunflower Capital
**Sleek User Experience**

‚ÄúReally like the UI of Canopy. Way better than other co-investment platforms for sure.‚Äù
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61c386a6753d19b4f26dad22_autor-4.png)

VPat Zendesk
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61c383d39e2602cb79dddf41_bullit-3.svg)

Payment is fully automated and happens after funding for your opportunities have been collected. There is no upfront cost to using Canopy.
‚ÄúMy friend is leading a syndicate on another platform. I noticed the large upfront platform fees relative to Canopy, so I suggested that she make the switch. The easier to use interface and better economics makes it a better option.‚Äù

How it works
## Streamline the investment process
Set up an opportunity
Quickly share round details and key intel with your LP network through the Canopy fundraising prospectus.
Collect inteterst
Easily inventory the level of interest from your LPs in one dashboard and monitor your funding progress to completion.
LPs sign and wire
Sit back as your LPs sign and wireCanopy handles the administrative work of collecting e-signatures and funding from participating LPs.
Reporting
Analyze your portfolio's performance from Canopy‚Äôs proprietary dashboards and share updates with your LPs at any time.

Flexible options
## Pick our full-coverage platform to manage all your diverse private investments
The Canopy platform was designed for all private investments and supports international deals & LPs.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61c9b3446f2ac76091b904ed_Icon-warning.png)
All investors must meet US accredited investor criteria
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61cc6278bdaf70f907c4c972_new-icon-1.svg)Syndicate & Co-InvestmentsEasily set up and manage SPVs for co-investments of all sizes](https://www.heycanopy.com/</syndicate-co-investments>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61cc62797031695b758180da_new-icon-2.svg)**Private Funds** BetaRaise a fund and manage future capital deployment](https://www.heycanopy.com/</private-funds>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61cc6279f1bf383fd0a639c8_new-icon-3.svg)Other SPVsComing SoonInvest in real estate, movie studio projects, crypto, and more](https://www.heycanopy.com/</other-spvs>)
‚ÄúThe ability to manage hundreds of LPs and multiple deals in parallel with one dashboard is extremely empowering. It beats using other platforms which are painfully manual and require customer support every step of the way.‚Äù
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61c386a6c0e57134d85d6f5f_autor-1.png)
Dave Lu
Managing Partner at Hyphen Capital
‚ÄúCanopy's CRM features enable me to manage my LP network at scale. With features like pre-populated email templates, custom tagging for LPs, and 1-click importing, coordinating my LPs has never been easier!‚Äù
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61cb35ea55dce26923974825_Paige-Doherty.png)
Paige Doherty
Founding Partner at Behind Genius Ventures
"With Canopy, fund managers can not only increase their overall income, but also deliver better access and returns for their LPs, enhancing LP retention."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61cb35d00cb36b8f13e56f28_Steve-Schlenker.jpg)
Steve Schlenker
Co-Founder and Managing Director, DN Capital
‚ÄúIt should not go unmentioned how nice it is to have a deal go so well like this üòä. Feeling grateful for Canopy!‚Äù
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61cd92310a0f507cf6f0fb73_Wil-Chockley-min.jpg)
Wil Chockley
Partner at 75 & Sunny
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61d6fb771c283e47c583a10a_Hyphen_gray.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61d700bf0d334156fc0cf3b4_Hyphen_color.svg)

Why Canopy?
## A technology-first approach to funding
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61c383d3f268d708dee7e263_bullit-1.svg)
Full Transparency
Dashboards keep track of exactly where investors are in the closing process, and automatic communications keep them informed.
‚ÄúI love running my deals through Canopy! Beyond closing the opportunity, Canopy makes it easy for me to update my LPs through email updates and platform announcements.‚Äù
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61cd965f80bba0febe0058e1_Liu-Jiang-LinkedIn.jpg)
Liu Jiang
Manager at Sunflower Capital
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61c383d39e2602cb79dddf41_bullit-3.svg)
Pay When Your Fund Closes
Payment is fully automated and happens after your opportunity has been funded. There is no upfront cost to using Canopy.
‚ÄúMy friend is leading a syndicate on another platform. I noticed the large upfront platform fees relative to Canopy, so I suggested that she make the switch. The easier to use interface and better economics makes it a better option.‚Äù

How it works
## Streamline the investment process
Set up an opportunity
Quickly share round details and key intel with your LP network through the Canopy fundraising prospectus.
Collect inteterst
Easily inventory the level of interest from your LPs in one dashboard and monitor your funding progress to completion.
LPs sign and wire
Sit back as your LPs sign and wireCanopy handles the administrative work of collecting e-signatures and funding from participating LPs.
Reporting
Analyze your portfolio's performance from Canopy‚Äôs proprietary dashboards and share updates with your LPs at any time.

## Pick our full-coverage platform to manage all your diverse private investments
The Canopy platform was designed for all private investments and supports international deals & LPs.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61c1c0b4e368108c5ab02f30/61c9b3446f2ac76091b904ed_Icon-warning.png)
All investors must meet US accredited investor criteria

generated_description:
### Canopy: Streamlining E-Commerce Transactions

**Overview**  
Canopy, previously known as Encarte, is a startup based in San Francisco that's on a mission to simplify online purchasing through a seamless 1-click checkout experience for various e-commerce platforms. The company was founded in 2019 and is currently part of Y Combinator Batch W19.

**What They Do**  
Canopy focuses on making the administrative tasks involved in private equity co-investments and special purpose vehicles (SPVs) more efficient. Their platform reduces the complexities around legal documentation, tax filing, and fund management, thus allowing syndicates and VC firms to operate more effectively.

**Team and Structure**  
The company operates with a lean team of just two employees, reflecting a startup mentality that prioritizes agility and innovation. 

**Key Features**  
Here‚Äôs what Canopy brings to the table:
1. **Syndicate & Co-Investments:** Easy setup and management of SPVs tailored for any size of co-investment.
2. **Private Funds (Beta):** Tools for raising funds and managing future capital deployment.
3. **Founders CRM:** A customer relationship management software specifically designed for fundraising, making it simple to track interest and manage SAFE agreements.
4. **Performance Reporting:** Users can analyze their portfolio‚Äôs performance anytime using Canopy‚Äôs integrated dashboards.

**User Experience**  
Canopy is designed with user efficiency in mind. Investors can complete subscription forms and link their bank accounts in a matter of clicks. One standout feature is that payments are only processed after the fund closes, meaning no upfront costs for fund managers.

**Market Orientation**  
Canopy has strategically aligned itself with key sectors such as fintech and e-commerce. The company is increasingly recognized within the San Francisco Bay Area as a forward-thinking player in the payments landscape.

**Future Aspirations**  
Canopy aims to soon expand its offerings to a broader client base by enhancing its infrastructure for all private investments. Their ambition is to become a go-to platform for both seasoned investors and newcomers seeking to navigate the complexities of fund management.

**Get Involved**  
Interested parties can learn more by visiting [Canopy's website](https://www.heycanopy.com/) or requesting a demo to experience how Canopy can optimize their investment processes.

If you're looking to streamline your e-commerce transactions or enhance your fund management processes, Canopy may just be the tool you need to simplify complexity and drive efficiency.
